w21z6v2fxy.directions: Take the lift to level 7 carpark. Out the door (no. 7), turn left and walk straight to the end of carpark (near iSetan sign), near carpark no. 123 & no. 124. Take the pathway near the trubines and it will lead to a "Fire Exit/Staircase 2" door. Open the door to the staircase landing. Musolla is located inside.
w21z6v2fxy.name: Wisma Atria Shopping Centre
w21z6v2fxy.provision: Slippers, Telekung, Prayer Mat, Al-Quran, Fan, Standing separator, Sarong, Chair
w21z6v2fxy.remarks: There is also a small white ceramic basin outside the musolla for ablution. Shared male and female praying area.

w21z6vbfyu.directions: From the entrance, walk straight past the Straits Kitchen and lift lobby into the carpark. Once past the carpark entrance, turn right and look for door that states 'Prayer Room'.
w21z6vbfyu.name: Grand Hyatt Hotel
w21z6vbfyu.provision: Prayer Mat, Sarong, Sejadah, Songkok, Telekung, Attar, Tasbih, Al-Quran, Mirror, Chair, Slippers
w21z6vbfyu.remarks: Strictly for staffs/tenants. Male and female praying area are segregated by a sliding curtain.

w21z6v3w5c.directions: Take the lift to level 10, walk straight (about 50 metres) and turn left.
w21z6v3w5c.name: Lucky Plaza

images.caption: Ablution in toilet Near The Musholla

w21z6vbw8g.directions: From hotel entrance, walk straight and turn right to the male and female toilets next to the lift lobby. There will be signs that lead to the musolla (surau). Go upstairs to the carpark. Turn left before the entrance to the carpark (enter the door that states 'surau').
w21z6vbw8g.name: Royal Plaza on Scotts
w21z6vbw8g.provision: Prayer Mat, Telekung, Al-Quran, Tasbih, Chair, Slippers, Attar
w21z6vbw8g.remarks: There is an ablution area in the musolla. Male and female praying area are segregated by a sliding wall.

w21z6v1uf6.directions: Proceed towards the public toilet. Go straight to the washing bay past the toilets. There is a small room that states "Store" for prayers.
w21z6v1uf6.name: Takashimaya at Ngee Ann City Tower A
w21z6v1uf6.provision: Slippers, Prayer Mat, Radio, Stool, Sarong, Fan
w21z6v1uf6.remarks: Strictly for staffs/tenants. Shared male and female toilet. Basins are located outside musolla.
